function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data integration for specific COVID-19 impacts","Impact":"Inability to accurately track and analyze COVID-19 impacts in real-time","Mitigation":"Improve data integration, analysis, and visualization for COVID-19 impact tracking","Technologies":"Data integration tools, analytics software, visualization platforms","People":"Researchers, council officers","Owner":"UO research team"},{"Description":"Rapid development of dashboard","Impact":"Potential for errors or inaccuracies in real-time data tracking","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of dashboard functionality","Technologies":"Testing tools, validation frameworks","People":"UO research team","Owner":"UO research team"},{"Description":"Observing social change without clear action plan","Impact":"Difficulty in responding to emerging social changes effectively","Mitigation":"Develop clear action plans based on observed social changes","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, decision support systems","People":"City officials, policy makers","Owner":"UO research team"}]}
